title: Rek'Sai Sated Bug
body: So when you are sated, you can sometimes apply red buff to yourself, and the visual effect from Grasp of the Undying plays, but I don't think it has any effect. I did notice that I was taking more damage than I should be, so maybe it deals the Grasp of the Undying effect to yourself which makes little sense. I did get Titanic Hydra in each game as well so it might have some interaction with that too. Mostly it happens on the second Q proc, but sometimes happens a couple auto's after.

replies.body:
Teemo Bug:

I noticed this while in-game.

1. If you take Winspeaker's Blessing on Teemo,
2. then buy no items, 
3. kill 1 small Raptor,
4. recall to base, 
5. buy Rejuvenation Bead and a vision ward, 
6. and then die to dragon.

Do that in that order before 69 minutes and you will enter god mode and become un-killable with 420420420 AP.

I swear it's true, I don't need any proof for you to believe me right?

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=sJjN0APZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-07T21:15:20.887+0000)
>
> Teemo Bug:
> 
> I noticed this while in-game.
> 
> 1. If you take Winspeaker's Blessing on Teemo,
> 2. then buy no items, 
> 3. kill 1 small Raptor,
> 4. recall to base, 
> 5. buy Rejuvenation Bead and a vision ward, 
> 6. and then die to dragon.
> 
> Do that in that order before 69 minutes and you will enter god mode and become un-killable with 420420420 AP.
> 
> I swear it's true, I don't need any proof for you to believe me right?

The sarcasm is a little over the top here, but regardless, I noticed this bug in game and I have no idea how to actually record proof.
See if you can still download the replay [here](http://www.replay.gg/).
